about.TextOne: I am interested in IT and programming because I enjoy solving problems and developing digital solutions that can help in everyday life. My motivation is to continuously improve my skills and keep up with new technologies.
about.TextTwo: I currently live in my present region and am open to various working models, including remote work. If suitable opportunities arise, I can also consider relocating.
about.TextThree: I am open to learning new technologies and methods and regularly work on expanding my knowledge and gaining practical experience.
about.TextFour: When facing challenges, I try to approach problems calmly and in a structured way, working step by step to find a solution. Analytical thinking, perseverance, and collaboration with others help me develop good and efficient solutions.

skills.TextOne: I have worked with various frontend technologies in different projects and gained practical experience.
skills.TextFive: I continuously learn new technologies and frameworks to expand my knowledge.

projects.TextOne: Discover a selection of my work here — interact with the projects to experience my skills in action.
projects.TextTwo: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop, and assign users and categories.
projects.TextThree: A simple side-scrolling platform game developed using an object-oriented approach. Help El Polo Loco collect coins and poison bottles to fight against enemies.

formular.TextOne: Do you have a problem to solve?
formular.TextTwo: Encourage people to contact you and describe which role you are interested in. Show that your work can add value to their projects.
formular.TextThree: Do you need a frontend developer?

experiences.text: Michael really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.
experiences.author: V. Schuster

experiences.text: The collaboration was smooth and very efficient. Great communication and results.
experiences.author: Anna Weber

experiences.text: Professional workflow and excellent teamwork throughout the project.
experiences.author: Daniel Koch
